# Abjuration (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | Bronzozek (drow) |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** You cast abjuration spells at +1 caster level.

**Abjuration Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Alarm (Spell)|Alarm]]****:** Wards an area for 2 hours/level.

**2** **[[Shield (Spell)|Shield]]****:** Invisible disc gives +4 to AC, blocks magic missiles.

**3** **[[Glyph of Warding (Spell)|Glyph of Warding]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Inscription harms those who pass it.

**4** **[[Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser (Spell)|Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser]]****:** Stops 1st- through 3rd-level spell effects.

**5** **[[Dispel Chaos (Spell)|Dispel Chaos]]****:** +4 against attacks by chaotic creatures.

** ** **[[Dispel Evil (Spell)|Dispel Evil]]****:** +4 against attacks by evil creatures.

** ** **[[Dispel Good (Spell)|Dispel Good]]****:** +4 against attacks by good creatures.

** ** **[[Dispel Law (Spell)|Dispel Law]]****:** +4 against attacks by lawful creatures.

**6** **[[Guards and Wards (Spell)|Guards and Wards]]****:** Array of magic effects protect area.

**7** **[[Banishment (Spell)|Banishment]]****:** Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

**8** **[[Protection From Spells (Spell)|Protection from Spells]]** **<sup>MF</sup>:** Confers +8 resistance bonus.

**9** **[[Imprisonment (Spell)|Imprisonment]]****:** Entombs subject beneath the earth.

**Source:** Races of Renown: Plot and Poison (Green Ronin), pg. 124
